query.q: owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'StorageConstruct'), class_properties(T, knowrob:'typePrimaryFunction-StoragePlaceFor', knowrob:'Perishable'), owl_individual_of(Obj, T), highlight_object_with_children(Obj).
query.text: What is the storage place for perishable items?
Which events occurred that acted on a spoon?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'Spoon'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'GraspingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'bodyPartsUsed',PART), owl_individual_of(PART, knowrob:'AnimalBodyPart').
query.text: Which body part(s) were used for spoon grasping events?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'Spoon'), owl_has(EVENT, knowrob:'objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'GraspingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), add_stickman_visualization('forth', forth_human:'forth_human_robot1', T0, '', '').
query.text: How was the human pose whenspoon grasping events started?
